21850.「……緊張しますね 軍議なんて。\n ドゥラくんは 天魔クァバルナの復活について:
Military councils always make me nervous...
I wonder what Dura managed to find regarding
Kukulkannibal's revival...

21851.「始まるみたいですよ。: Looks like it's about to start.

21852.「それでは これより\n ドルワーム機密軍議を 始める！:
We will now begin the confidential Dolworm
military council!

21853.「まずは 以前 報告した\n 天魔クァバルナの 復活に関する続報だ。\n 皆 心:
First off, I'd like to follow up with my
earlier report about the demon's revival.
Please listen carefully.

21854.「……私は あれから この天魔黙示録を\n 余すことなく 調べ上げた。:
I've been scouring every last page of the
Kukulkannibapocalypse to see what I can find.

21855.「そして クァバルナ復活に関する\n 恐るべき事実に たどりついたのだ。:
That's when I discovered the terrible truth
about his revival.

21857.「天魔黙示録には こう書かれている。: This is what is written inside the book.

21858.「……天魔クァバルナは 遠い昔\n 深き闇より現れ ドルワームの地に君臨した。\:
Long ago, Kukulkannibal emerged from the depths of darkness and reigned over the land of Dolworm. He brought forth many disasters,
and the people continued to suffer.

21859.「天魔クァバルナは 滅することがない。\n 冥界にて キズを癒やすと\n ふたた:
Kukulkannibal can never be destroyed. When
his wounds heal in the netherworld, he once
again returns to this mortal realm...

21860.「そして…… 前世の恨みと呪いにより\n さらに強靭な肉体を たずさえ\n 我ら:
And then... By the power granted from grudges
and curses of past lives, he bears an even
stronger body, bringing endless despair...

21861.「そんな……。あのクァバルナが\n パワーアップして 帰ってくるってこと？\n:
Oh, no... So what you're saying is that demon
is coming back even stronger than before?!
Back to Dolworm...?!

21862.「なんてことだ……。\n ドルワームは 呪われているのか……？:
How can this be...
Is Dolworm cursed...?

21863.「そう。始まったのだ。絶望の連鎖が……。:
That's right. It's already begun. A cycle of
despair...

21864.「クァバルナが 何度でも よみがえるなら\n ボクらは いったい どうすればいい:
If Kukulkannibal can keep coming back to life
over and over, then what are we supposed to
do?! Will Dolworm ever know peace?!

21865.「この危機を逃れる方法は ただ ひとつ……。: There is but one way out of this crisis...

21866.「やつの身体を 滅することができないのであれば\n 我々に 残された手段は 天魔:
If we cannot destroy his body, then the only
option left is to seal him away.

21867.「……事実 クァバルナが ここに現れる前も\n やつは 封印されていた。\n 先:
In fact, he was sealed before his most recent
appearance here. Our ancestors had the same
idea.

21868.「なるほど 封印か……。でも ドゥラくん。\n 封印なんて 簡単に できるものな:
I see... A seal...? But, Dura...
Is it really that easy?

21869.「封印のために 必要な要素は ふたつ。\n まずは 復活した天魔クァバルナを\n:
There are two things necessary for sealing
him away. First, the revived Kukulkannibal
must be weakened to a near-death state.

21870.「そして 封印のチカラを宿した聖具\n ゼキルの聖杭を やつの胸に突き立てれば…:
Then, we must drive Zekir's Holy Stake into
his chest. This stake contains a sealing
power, so it will seal him deep in this land.

21871.「ゼキルの聖杭は まだ 我々の手にはない。\n しかし 材料さえ そろえば\n:
We do not have the stake at the moment.
However, if the materials are gathered, I can
make one myself with no issue.

21872.「王立騎士団の者は 来たるべき 決戦の日に備え\n 戦闘訓練に 従事してほしい。:
I want all knights to engage in combat
training for the battle that is to come.

21873.「<pc>さんには ゼキルの聖杭を作るのに\n 必要な材料を 集めてもらおうと思:
I'm thinking it's best for <pc> to
gather the materials needed for the stake.
We'll talk more about that later.

21874.「……以上が 天魔クァバルナを迎え撃つ\n 最良の策だと 私は考えた。\n 異論:
...and that is the best way I believe that we
can deal with Kukulkannibal.
Does anyone have any objections?

21875.「……ドゥラくん すごいよ。\n その作戦なら きっと うまくいくよ！:
You're amazing, Dura!
I'm sure you're plan's gonna work!

21876.「それでは 以上をもって\n 今回の機密軍議は 閉会とする！\n 各自 全力で:
And with that, this confidential council is
concluded! Everyone, please do your best
with your respective roles!

21877.「<pc>さん。\n 先ほど お話しした通り ゼキルの聖杭の材料を\n あなたに:
<pc>. As you heard just a moment
ago, I'll need you to gather the materials
for Zekir's Holy Stake.

21878.「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために 必要な材料は\n きんのゆびわと 聖木の枝の ふたつ:
To make it, I'll need two materials:
a Gold Ring and a Holy Branch.

21879.「きんのゆびわは ウェナ諸島にある\n ヴェリナード城下町の アクセサリーショッ:
You can purchase a Gold Ring in Verinard's
accessory shop. Verinard is located on the
Wena Islands.

21880.「聖木の枝は オルフェア地方西の南東\n 川を渡った地や 呪われた大地などにいる:
Holy Branches are dropped by Treevils. You can find them in the western Orphea Region across the southeast river, or in the Cursed
Land.

21881.「世界を自由に動ける あなたにこそ\n この仕事を 引き受けてもらいたいのです。:
You're free to move about wherever you please,
so that's why I need you do to this for me.
Will you help?

21882.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n 私は 院長室に戻っていますので\n:
Thank you. I'll return to the Director's
office, so please come there once you've
gathered the materials.

21885.「もしかして…… クァバルナの呪いが\n ドゥラくんの身体を……？:
Don't tell me... Has the demon's curse taken
over your body, Dura...?

21886.「……ご心配なく ラミザ王子。\n ただ このところ 不眠不休で\n クァバルナ:
No need to worry, Prince Ramiza.
I've merely been working tirelessly for
the past few days, that's all...

21887.「……そっか。それなら\n 作戦は 決まったんだし もう大丈夫だよ。\n ドゥラ:
Y-yeah... Well, we should be fine since the
plan's been decided. Make sure to take a
well-deserved rest, Dura.

21888.「……お心づかい 痛み入ります。\n 院長室に戻ったら すこし休むとしましょう。:
I appreciate the concern... I'll be sure to
take a short rest once I return to my room.
If you'll excuse me...

21889.「ボクも 騎士団長室に戻ります。\n <pc>さん ゼキルの聖杭の件\n よろし:
I'm headed back to the captain's room.
I'm counting on you to take care of that
stake!

21890.「……おや <pc>さん。\n 困ったことに あなたは 他の方の依頼を\n たく:
Oh, it seems you're a bit busy with other
requests at the moment.

21891.「……そうですか。それは 困りました。\n あなたは ドルワームの者ではないので:
I see... That's troublesome. Since you're not
from Dolworm, I can't give you orders.

21892.「ああ <pc>さん。\n 我々に 救いの手を差し伸べるため\n 戻ってきてくれ:
Oh, <pc>. Have you come back to
lend us a hand?

21893.「復活する 天魔クァバルナに対抗するには\n やつを 封印する以外 道はありませ:
The only way to defeat Kukulkannibal is to
seal him away. To do that, we need Zekir's
Holy Stake.

21894.「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために 必要な材料は\n きんのゆびわと 聖木の枝の ふたつ:
To make the stake, I need two materials:
a Gold Ring and a Holy Branch. I need
you to gather them for me.

21895.「きんのゆびわは ウェナ諸島にある\n ヴェリナード城下町の アクセサリーショッ:
You can purchase a Gold Ring in Verinard's
accessory shop. Verinard is located on the
Wena Islands.

21896.「聖木の枝は オルフェア地方西の南東\n 川を渡った地や 呪われた大地などにいる:
Holy Branches are dropped by Treevils. You can find them in the western Orphea Region across the southeast river, or in the Cursed
Land.

21897.「世界を自由に動ける あなたにこそ\n この仕事を 引き受けてもらいたいのです。:
You're free to move about wherever you please,
so that's why I need you do to this for me.
Will you help?

29830.「しかし 天魔クァバルナの封印には\n あなたの協力が 不可欠です。\n 手が空:
However, your cooperation is essential in
sealing away the demon. Will you consider
coming back when you are free?

29831.「しかし 天魔クァバルナの封印には\n あなたの協力が 不可欠です。\n 気が変:
However, your cooperation is essential in
sealing away the demon. Please return
here if you change your mind.
